label: relatedTTLocation
comment: A Track and Trace (TT) location related to this animal holding event.

rangeIncludes.comment: A physical place related to a Track and Trace (TT) process.

A Track and Trace (TT) event where objects or processes are grouped.
A Track and Trace (TT) animal or a group of animals, such as those kept or raised on a farm, ranch.
